answers.answer: Right before you take the test?

No. I had them for breakfast today and I have my glucose test tomorrow.. and also I don't drink that much water.. do u think I can pass it.? I really don't want to be there 3 hrs and be told I have diabetes
The cookies dont matter, i had tons of sweets the night before i took mine an i passed lol. Luckily so because i crave tons of sweets
Oh ok.. I was kind of worried.. thank u
No problemo just dont eat during your fasting times,good luck!!
I think u just have to cut off your food intake after midnight if im not mistaken
....but you probably should have something more substantial for dinner or a midnight snack, just incase!  :)

question: If I had lots of sugar cookies would it not let me pass my test
title: glucose test
